articles.title: GM CEO Barra, Fords Bill Ford at White House dinner for Saudi prince
articles.body: The day after the dinner, the U.S. and Saudi Arabia inked an agreement that ensures the kingdom recognizes American auto safety standards.
articles.raw_text: GM CEO Barra, Fords Bill Ford at White House dinner for Saudi prince. The day after the dinner, the U.S. and Saudi Arabia inked an agreement that ensures the kingdom recognizes American auto safety standards.

articles.title: Peter Thiels hedge fund sells Nvidia stake, Ford-Amazon partnership
articles.body: Yahoo Finances John Hyland tracks todays top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including Stifel analysts boosting their price target on Tesla TSLA stock, Peter Thiels hedge fund Thiel Macro fund sold off the entirety of its Nvidia NVDA stake, and Amazon AMZN partnering with Ford F to sell pre-owned cars online. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finances Market Minute.

articles.title: Amazon, Ford Partner on Used Cars. 4 Stocks That Could Be Impacted.
articles.body: Amazon com, with its penchant for disrupting retail industries, is going after the used car business with the help of Ford Motor That could be bad news for CarGurus Cars.com CarMax and Carvana though they werent really acting like it, for the most part. Monday, Ford Motor and Amazon announced that car buyers can shop for certified preowned Ford vehicles on Amazon Autos. Amazon launched its car buying platform in late 2024, partnering with Hyundai Motor Hertz was Amazon Autos first fleet customer.

articles.title: Skip the dealership and buy a used Ford on Amazon What to know
articles.body: Amazon AMZN and Ford F are teaming up to offer certified used vehicles from dealerships through the e-commerce giants new Amazon Autos site. Yahoo Finance Senior Autos Reporter Pras Subramanian outlines the details on Market Domination Overtime. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.

articles.body: Ford is partnering with Amazon for the automakers franchised dealers to be able to sell certified pre-owned vehicles through the online retail giant.
